file_insights.changes_summary: Added new endpoint get_optimal_timing to recommend optimal job execution times based on cost predictions
Added Pydantic models for optimal timing request and response

patterns_discovered: Cost prediction based on machine learning forecasts
Dynamic time window calculation for job scheduling
Database query for current market snapshot
gotchas_discovered: Requires at least 50 hours of price history to generate recommendations
Job duration limited between 1 and 168 hours
Model confidence dynamically adjusts based on proximity to start time

key_achievements: Created comprehensive optimal timing recommendation endpoint
Implemented multi-level cost and savings analysis
Generated ranked time windows with confidence scores

recommendations: Add more comprehensive error handling for edge cases
Add logging for recommendation generation process
